Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers

Class ControllerGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.ControllerGUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoardPopUpController, GameEndedController, GenericErrorController, InitializeCardsController, LobbyController, MainSceneController, MenuController, NicknameController, NicknamePopUpController, PublisherController, ReconnectPopUpController, ScoretrackPopupController
public abstract class ControllerGUI extends Object
Abstract controller class to manage user inputs in the GUI. This class serves as a base class implemented by various controllers for different scenes.
